data.text: Big money is made when you buy high growth, ROCE at low P/E. Hero Moto (Hero Honda in those days) was quoting at 0.5x sales with decades of growth ahead Today @nooreshtech tweeted few names at 20-30x sales, crazy P/E and yet ppl feel good buying them
